text: Enati mutu wulembo yoluka buna bika kayoluka banga mutu wunyoluka mambu ma Nzambi. Enati mutu wulembo sadila bankaka buna bika kasadila mu zingolo zivana Nzambi muingi mu mambu moso Nzambi kakemboso mu diambu di Yesu Klisto, bila niandi vuidi nkembo ayi lulendo mu zikhama zi zikhamazi mimvu. AmenÂ !
